Text: Are you sure to re-assign colors to all beavers and bots according to the current settings?
Some beavers with special names will have specific colors. Editable file located at: Documents\Timberborn\ColorfulBeavers\ColorNames.txt
Assign a random color to every beaver. Editable color list at: Documents\Timberborn\ColorfulBeavers\RandomColors.txt
Apply random color to the bots as well.
